message.content: The paper belongs to the arXiv CS sub-category "cs.CL" (Computation and Language). Other likely sub-categories include "cs.IR" (Information Retrieval), "cs.AI" (Artificial Intelligence), "cs.LG" (Machine Learning), and "cs.NE" (Neural and Evolutionary Computing). This is because the paper discusses a specific challenge in information retrieval (IR) related to natural language processing (NLP), which falls under the domain of computation and language. Additionally, the paper proposes a novel approach to question answering (QA) using question entailment, which is a common technique in NLP and AI. The paper also mentions the use of machine learning and neural networks in their experiments, which aligns with the sub-categories of "cs.LG" and "cs.NE". Finally, the paper's focus on QA suggests that it may also be relevant to the sub-category of "cs.IR".
